members.source: const string mongoURL = "mongodb://" + username + ":" + password + "@supermarketpurchases-shard-00-00.ivgfu.mongodb.net:27017,supermarketpurchases-shard-00-01.ivgfu.mongodb.net:27017,supermarketpurchases-shard-00-02.ivgfu.mongodb.net:27017/" + database + "?ssl=true&replicaSet=atlas-3o9ayk-shard-0&authSource=admin&retryWrites=true&w=majority";

documentationLines.source: # A service representing a network-accessible API

documentationString.source:
# A service representing a network-accessible API
# bound to port `9090`.

# + _id - n
# + bar_code - n
# + brand_name - n
# + name - n
# + price - n
# + size - n
# + date - n
#

statements.source:
products += ("{bar_code: " + tempProduct.bar_code + "," +
                            "brand_name: " + tempProduct.brand_name + "," +
                            "name: " + tempProduct.name + "," +
                            "price: " + tempProduct.price + "," +
                            "size: " + tempProduct.size + "}");
